stimulusHtml: Which of the following is most directly related to the social advancement of African American female leaders at the turn of the twentieth century?

features.html:
Collection of the Smithsonian National Museum of African American History and Culture

1910 on the banner refers to the year the Oklahoma Federation of Colored Women’s Clubs was founded.

choicesHtml: Booker T. Washington organized Black women’s suffrage protests.
Harriet Jacobs wrote first hand accounts of life under slavery in the nineteenth century.
Organized Black labor unions created advertisement banners to encourage members to join.
Nannie Helen Burroughs helped establish the National Association of Colored Women.
